body_html: FYI, I submitted b4cc45a to explicitly check whether certain internal memory allocations succeed. If it is possible for you to build and run from source, give it a try to see whether the issue was indeed caused by OOM.
body_text: FYI, I submitted b4cc45a to explicitly check whether certain internal memory allocations succeed. If it is possible for you to build and run from source, give it a try to see whether the issue was indeed caused by OOM.
body: FYI, I submitted https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commit/b4cc45a2f66fad9f2dbf6db16b28741fffa7780b to explicitly check whether certain internal memory allocations succeed. If it is possible for you to build and run from source, give it a try to see whether the issue was indeed caused by OOM.
